values: Lovers of Truth in a Politically Correct (Sex-leveling) WorldLovers of Truth in a Politically Correct (Sex-leveling) World

Loving and speaking the truth in a politically correct and sex-leveling world will require courage, humility, and a willingness to be maligned for the sake of Christ.
